name: Suzume 铃芽之旅 すずめの戸締まり 铃芽户缔
description:
Introduction

Suzume is a LoRA that has been trained on a dataset of screenshots extracted from available trailers. Explore Suzume to boost your Suzume style AIGC productivity.

Installation

Download it to folder models/lora/ or additional network extension folders.

Usage & Tips

  • trigger word: ssmrin

  • preferred weight: 0.65

  • tips: full body picture requires higher resolution or higher LoRA weight

Credit

Credit to Makoto Shinkai, 光之翼_Lightwing

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, ssmrin, 1girl, green pleated skirt, rain, short sleeves, solo, sky, black leather shoes, white shirt, school uniform, (stairs leading up to a ((torii)) nestled on a hilltop), (dreamlike atmosphere), (Cherry blossom trees adorned the area with delicate petals gently falling), light black hair, ponytail, brown eyes, artbytokiame, bare hands, running down stairs, portrait,
meta.negativePrompt: badhandv4, EasyNegative, verybadimagenegative_v1.3,illustration, 3d, sepia, painting, cartoons, sketch, (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, bad anatomy, normal quality, ((monochrome)), ((grayscale)), (2girls), (multiple girls),
